text: Phyllis Dalton, (16 October 1925 â€“ 9 January 2025) was an English costume designer. She won two Academy Awards, a BAFTA Award, a Saturn Award, and an Emmy Award. Dalton was best known for her works with directors David Lean, Carol Reed, Rob Reiner, and Kenneth Branagh. Dalton received three nominations for the Academy Award for Best Costume Design, and won twice for Doctor Zhivago (1965) and Henry V (1989). Dalton died on 9 January 2025 in Somerset, England at the age of 99. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Academy Award winners Category:Emmy Award winners Category:BAFTA Award winners Category:Costume designers Category:People from London
title: Phyllis Dalton
